name: ENGAGE
abstract: ENGAGE is a metaverse platform designed for professionals. Through metaworlds, they can transform how people collaborate globally by harnessing the powers of immersive technologies

detail.app_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Korean, Spanish, Traditional Chinese, French, Japanese, German
detail.app_release_note:
NEW
- Added an option to prevent non-hosts from inviting their connections to a session.
- Added a view of sent but pending connection requests.

IMPROVED
- Increased the length of session IDs and removed characters that could be easily confused.
- Set new sessions to appear first in the live sessions list.
- Added a numerical indication of how many connection requests are pending.
- Added a filter to show only connections who are online.
- Improved the interface used to select people in the application. 
- Added WCAG compliant loading bars in the application.

FIXED
- Fixed an issue that could cause grabbed network objects captured in a recording to be offset when played back.
- Fixed an issue where a user could avoid being affected by a seat all command by using controller inputs during the countdown.
- Ensured appropriate error is displayed if a user needs to reauthenticate because of a change to SSO or 2FA settings.
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO G2 4k, PICO Neo2, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO 4E, PICO G3, PICO Neo3 Eye, PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO Neo2 Lite, PICO 4, PICO Neo2 Wigig, PICO 4 Pro
